analyzed: tena ñāṇena tam ñāṇam jānāti iti
tena ñāṇena tam ñāṇam jānāti iti
tena ñāṇena tam ñāṇam jānāti iti
tena ñāṇena tam ñāṇam jānāti iti

original: Tena phassena taṁ phassaṁ phusati, tāya vedanāya taṁ vedanaṁ vedeti, tāya saññāya
analyzed: tena phassena tam phassam phusati tāya vedanāya tam vedanam vedeti tāya saññāya

original: taṁ saññaṁ sañjānāti, tāya cetanāya taṁ cetanaṁ ceteti, tena cittena taṁ cittaṁ cinteti,
analyzed: tam saññam sañjānāti tāya cetanāya tam cetanam ceteti tena cittena tam cittam cinteti

original: tena vitakkena taṁ vitakkaṁ vitakketi, tena vicārena taṁ vicāraṁ vicāreti, tāya pītiyā
analyzed: tena vitakkena tam vitakkam vitakketi tena vicārena tam vicāram vicāreti tāya pītiyā

original: taṁ pītiṁ piyāyati, tāya satiyā taṁ satiṁ sarati, tāya paññāya taṁ paññaṁ pajānāti,
analyzed: tam pītim piyāyati tāya satiyā tam satim sarati tāya paññāya tam paññam pajānāti

original: tena khaggena taṁ khaggaṁ chindati, tena pharasunā taṁ pharasuṁ tacchati, tāya kudhāriyā
analyzed: tena khaggena tam khaggam chindati tena pharasunā tam pharasum tacchati tāya kudhāriyā

original: taṁ kudhāriṁ tacchati, tāya vāsiyā taṁ vāsiṁ tacchati, tāya sūciyā taṁ sūciṁ sibbeti,
analyzed: tam kudhārim tacchati tāya vāsiyā tam vāsim tacchati tāya sūciyā tam sūcim sibbeti

original: tena aṅgulaggena taṁ aṅgulaggaṁ parāmasati, tena nāsikaggena taṁ nāsikaggaṁ parāmasati,
analyzed: tena aṅgu laggena tam aṅgu laggam parāmasati tena nāsikā aggena tam nāsikā aggam parāmasati

original: tena matthakena taṁ matthakaṁ parāmasati, tena gūthena taṁ gūthaṁ dhovati, tena muttena
analyzed: tena matthakena tam matthakam parāmasati tena gūthena tam gūtham dhovati tena muttena

original: taṁ muttaṁ dhovati, tena kheḷena taṁ kheḷaṁ dhovati, tena pubbena taṁ pubbaṁ dhovati,
analyzed: tam muttam dhovati tena kheḷena tam kheḷam dhovati tena pubbena tam pubbam dhovati
tena lohitena tam lohitam dhovati iti

original: Nanu sabbasaṅkhāre aniccato diṭṭhe tampi ñāṇaṁ aniccato diṭṭhaṁ hotīti?
analyzed: nanu sabba saṅkhāre aniccataḥ diṭṭhe tat pi ñāṇam aniccataḥ diṭṭham hoti iti

original: Hañci sabbasaṅkhāre aniccato diṭṭhe tampi ñāṇaṁ aniccato diṭṭhaṁ hoti, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sabba saṅkhāre aniccataḥ diṭṭhe tam pi ñāṇam aniccataḥ diṭṭham hoti tena vata re vattabbe
